name: Octopus vs Squid
description:
High speed ink battles!

Choose between Octopus or Squid!

Uses two xinput gamepads.

Left stick - Aim

Right Trigger - Swim

Left Trigger - Ink

1/2 - Toggle AI for Player 1/2

You get darker when your ink is ready.

You get less saturated when you get tired.

The edges of the screen pull you in.

Tim Nicholson - Coding

Tim Nicholson - Art

Tim Nicholson - Design

Attila Branyiczky - Squid Consultant
